Articles.Content: When you rescue a kerbal, if you have them plant a flag it's the flag of the company that sent you out to get them? I just picked Kennand up on the Mun and had him drop a flag for grins. Imagine my surprise when I saw the Kerlington logo.
Really? That is something I would have never found!
Probably not intended as an easter egg, as it might have been easier for them code-wise to just use the contractor's flag when generating the kerbal...but still cool!
Probably because the "mission flag" for the vessel is set to their flag. Look at the command module, it will likely have the same flag.

> 
> Probably because the "mission flag" for the vessel is set to their flag. Look at the command module, it will likely have the same flag.

Yep, I just noticed in a screenshot that it does. I hadn't spotted it until I saw the planted flag though.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-10T02:33:24Z" title="05/10/2015 02:33  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 10, 2015</time> by saskwach**
  
ugh, word choice
